text.name: tooltip_playermovement_walkingMultiplier
text.text: A scaling factor for walking speed

text.name: tooltip_playermovement_runningMultiplier
text.text: A scaling factor for running speed

text.name: tooltip_playermovement_jumpMultiplier
text.text: A scaling factor for how high the player can jump

text.name: tooltip_playermovement_showDebug
text.text: Show the current speed in F1 menu and write debugging information to the log file
